entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
